sushi_selections.name: SUSHI SELECTIONS
Developed by Angel Carbajal of Nicksan, Cabo San Lucas
In 1994 Angel Carbajal started Nick--San in Cabo San Lucas and has since built a reputation for
its emphasis on seasonal, quality ingredients and presentation. He marries Japanese cuisine
with flavorful spicy ingredients.
tations” is the motto they follow at Nick-San. Angel has brought that same
quality of food and enthusiasm to Mastro’s with Sushi.
